attributes.action: For this country to recycle rubbish environmental friendly and generate energy.
attributes.additional_details: Video example available on request to as I only have the video without its link.
attributes.background:
I saw a video demonstration showing how Singapore recycle its rubbish efficiently and at the same time generate eco friendly energy.

Any countries can benefit by 'adopting' this eco friendly practice and help environment.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to emulate Singapore's approach to recycling and energy generation. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
